title: Victims of Uganda school attack buried as hunt for rebels continues
description: Some families whose children were burned beyond recognition are waiting for DNA results to identify their remains.

title: Boeing, Airbus to sell up to 1,000 airliners to Indian carriers
description: The massive orders by carriers India Air and IndiGo for hundreds of Boeing and Airbus jets underscore substantial economic growth in India.

title: Rare summer snow in Canada’s west won’t pause heat and fire threat long
description: Western Canada has seen freak snow and rain in recent days — a stark contrast from recent. Hot east, and heat takes over the rest of the country into next week.

title: French police search Paris 2024 Olympics offices amid corruption probe
description: Prosecutors opened investigations in 2017 and 2022 into alleged embezzlement of public funds, in connection with contracts awarded in advance of the games.

title: Ex-police officer, 2 others guilty in Chinese plot to lure back expatriates
description: Dissidents, people accused of crimes in China were subjected to relentless pressure campaigns to return, the U.S. government alleged.

title: Fighting simmers across Ukrainian front as Kyiv’s forces look to advance
description: Since the start of a major counteroffensive, Ukraine has claimed modest gains, including the liberation of seven villages, but the advances have been slow, prompting some analysts to speculate that Kyiv had temporarily paused its counterattack.

title: Deep water, high pressure: Why the Titanic sub search is so complex
description: The mission to locate the Titan submersible that was headed to the Titanic wreck is extremely challenging. It could become the deepest search and rescue mission ever.

title: U.S. and Iran in indirect talks over nuclear program and prisoners
description: With no hope of reviving 2015 nuclear agreement, the goal is reducing rising tensions and bringing home American detainees.

title: Search for submersible missing near Titanic wreck hits critical stage
description: The leader of the search for the OceanGate Expeditions vessel said about 70 to 96 hours of oxygen are available for the five people onboard.

title: What it’s like inside the missing submersible: ‘As much room as a minivan’
description: The Titan submersible's operator, OceanGate, advises people not to eat much before boarding it, and a former passenger said it was steered by a video game controller.

title: In China, Blinken once seen as a headache could be a remedy
description: After many doubts in the China media, the reasonably cordial meeting gave leader Xi Jinping a chance to present the country to the world as a reasonable partner.

title: Hidden beneath the surface
description: Canada's Crawford Lake may hold evidence that humans have fundamentally changed Earth enough to have started the Anthropocene, a new chapter in geologic time.

title: Andrew Tate, brother indicted on charges of rape, human trafficking
description: Andrew Tate, a self-described misogynist, was accused with brother Tristan of forming a crime group for human trafficking. Prosecutors will now send their case to trial.

title: Day-long Israel-Palestinian clash in Jenin escalates West Bank conflict
description: Palestinian militants damaged Israeli armored vehicles with roadside bombs while attack helicopters fired missiles overhead in scenes reminiscent of the fighting in Lebanon.

title: What we know about the submersible missing near the Titanic wreck
description: The Titan submersible that went missing on a trip to explore the Titanic wreckage is designed to provide 96 hours of life support for its five crew members.

title: Who is Hamish Harding, tycoon and adventurer on the missing Titanic sub?
description: The British adventurer and founder of aircraft broker Action Aviation is among five people on a submersible named Titan, which is missing in the deep Atlantic.

title: Outback Steakhouse was born in America. But nowhere loves it like Brazil.
description: Despite Brazil's own grilling culture, the American riff on Australian barbecue has gained extraordinary cachet

title: Ukraine live briefing: Water contaminated and aid efforts hampered after Kakhovka dam collapse
description: Waters are infected with salmonella, rotavirus and E. coli, and hundreds of houses are still flooded. The U.N. accused Moscow of blocking aid to occupied areas.

title: As Modi visits White House, India’s reliance on Russian arms constrains him
description: India has not condemned Russia's invasion of Ukraine, and India's overwhelming dependence on Russian military supplies is a big reason why.

title: U.S.-China ties are no longer in freefall, but it’s a rough road ahead
description: Still, for those hoping for happier relations, there’s a long, winding road ahead, littered with obstacle
